description: Police say the woman is in a stable condition in hospital and a man in his 20s has been arrested.
title: Teenager seriously injured in King's Lynn hit-and-run crash
title_page: Teenager seriously injured in King's Lynn hit-and-run crash - BBC News
maintext:
A woman in her late teens has been seriously injured in a suspected hit-and-run crash.
Norfolk Police said the pedestrian was struck by a dark Range Rover on Guanock Terrace in King's Lynn at about 00:30 GMT on Sunday.
A man in his 20s was later arrested on London Road on suspicion of causing serious injury by dangerous driving.
He was questioned and released on bail while investigations continued.
